<form onsubmit="event.preventDefault(); checkMCQAnswer('module6_multi_q002','C')" class="mcq-form">
  <p><strong>Q2.</strong> Regarding debt covenants, evaluate the following statements:</p>
  <ol type="I">
    <li>Covenants are contractual clauses that restrict the borrower's behavior.</li>
    <li>They are primarily designed to protect shareholders from management.</li>
    <li>Violating a covenant can trigger default or renegotiation.</li>
  </ol>

  <div class="options">
    <label><input type="radio" name="module6_multi_q002" value="A"> A) I only</label><br>
    <label><input type="radio" name="module6_multi_q002" value="B"> B) II only</label><br>
    <label><input type="radio" name="module6_multi_q002" value="C"> C) I and III only</label><br>
    <label><input type="radio" name="module6_multi_q002" value="D"> D) All of the above</label><br>
    <label><input type="radio" name="module6_multi_q002" value="E"> E) None of the above</label>
  </div>
</form>

<div id="feedback-module6_multi_q002" class="feedback" data-status="" style="display:none;">
Correct answer: <strong>C</strong>. Covenants protect lenders, not shareholders, and their violation may lead to default.
</div>
